info.title: Google Books
info.description: Search and discover data and details about and within books available in the vast library of Google

authors.description: Array of authors of the volume
authors.title: Authors

publishedDate.description: Date when the volume was published
publishedDate.title: Published Date

readingModes.description: Available reading modes for the volume
readingModes.title: Reading Mode

pageCount.description: Number of pages in the volume
pageCount.title: Page Count

categories.description: List of categorization tags of the volume
categories.title: Categories

canonicalVolumeLink.description: URL link to the canonical volume
canonicalVolumeLink.title: Canonical Volume Link

buyLink.description: URL link to buy the volume
buyLink.title: Buy Link

get.description: Query multiple volumes and books within the public Google library.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A valid query string for the Google Books API

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10, max. allowed is 40

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Set preset search filter to restrict the returned results

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: The position in the collection at which to start. Index for the first item is 0

parameters.name: printType
parameters.description: Use print type to restrict results to a specific print or publication type

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Restrict the returned fields with a predefined set

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Set the ordering of results by one of the options. Default is relevance

parameters.name: langRestrict
parameters.description: Restrict to results that are tagged with the specified ISO-639-1 language code, eg. fr

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select a custom subset of fields which should be returned with the results instead of all

get.description: Get a specific volume data by ID.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: A valid and unique Google Books volume ID

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Restrict the returned fields with a predefined set

parameters.name: langRestrict
parameters.description: Restrict to results that are tagged with the specified ISO-639-1 language code, eg. fr
